body:
- Fixed crash when pick tool was used out of map bounds
- Fixed various other crashes
- Fixed swarmer turret shooting ridiculously quickly
- Fixed 'player disconnected' messages after PvP game was restarted
- Fixed random maps not having any cliffs
- Fixed mend/overdrive projectors not displaying their real range
- Fixed chained storage blocks being extremely flammable/explosive when many flammable/explosive items were stored in the chain
- Added new UI style
- Added team display in player menu for PvP
- Added sorter item 'memory'
- Added list of contributors to credits
- Added key to take screenshot of full map [PC]
- Added build revision field for hotfixes
- Changed drones to use healing bullets instead of beams
- Buffed thermal generator
- Buffed melter
- Improved panning by allowing it to go over UI elements [Mobile]
- Removed default 'player' name
name: v4 Build 62 - Alpha
